settings.computedValue: State of the art cloud environment for building sustainable, low energy web experiences. Architected from the ground up to be the most optimized platform for rapid green website building and distribution to online audiences across the globe.
settings.name: content
settings.value: State of the art cloud environment for building sustainable, low energy web experiences. Architected from the ground up to be the most optimized platform for rapid green website building and distribution to online audiences across the globe.

settings.computedValue: Exercise full creative control realizing sustainable websites directly in your favorite browser on the cloud without installing any software. Advanced users can web build offline working locally with minimal impact on the environment. Druid has your back taking care of all technical details of sustainable web development allowing you to focus completely on delivering the best web experiences to your audience.
settings.name: content
settings.value: Exercise full creative control realizing sustainable websites directly in your favorite browser on the cloud without installing any software. Advanced users can web build offline working locally with minimal impact on the environment. Druid has your back taking care of all technical details of sustainable web development allowing you to focus completely on delivering the best web experiences to your audience.

settings.computedValue: Built around the principles of green software engineering from the ground up. Websites hosted on the Microsoft Azure cloud leveraging the giants most comprehensive, actionable sustainability policy. Includes AWS cloud integration with services such as; s3, Open Search following the sustainability pillar of the well-architected framework.
settings.name: content
settings.value: Built around the principles of green software engineering from the ground up. Websites hosted on the Microsoft Azure cloud leveraging the giants most comprehensive, actionable sustainability policy. Includes AWS cloud integration with services such as; s3, Open Search following the sustainability pillar of the well-architected framework.

settings.computedValue: All RollTheCloud Inc. projects are publicly available hosted on Github. Druid core is closed for modification but open for extension. Unlimited customizations is made possible by using cutting edge module federation native to platform core.
settings.name: content
settings.value: All RollTheCloud Inc. projects are publicly available hosted on Github. Druid core is closed for modification but open for extension. Unlimited customizations is made possible by using cutting edge module federation native to platform core.

settings.computedValue: Compatible with modern JavaScript framework (angular, react, vue, svelte, etc.). Druid core is built on top of the battle tested Angular framework by Google. However, druids can also be used as app shells for micro-frontends created in other mvvm JavaScript frameworks.
settings.name: content
settings.value: Compatible with modern JavaScript framework (angular, react, vue, svelte, etc.). Druid core is built on top of the battle tested Angular framework by Google. However, druids can also be used as app shells for micro-frontends created in other mvvm JavaScript frameworks.
